#summary Examples of flot4jsf2 usage.
#labels examples,chart,charttypes,barchart,linechart,dotschart

= EXAMPLES =

=== Bar chart ===

[http://flot4jsf2.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/barsFilled.png]

Code example:
{{{
<f4j2:chart width="320" height="240" data="#{sampleData.getBarsData()}" type="bars" color="red" fill="true" />
}}}

----
=== Line chart ===

[http://flot4jsf2.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/lines.png]

Code example:
{{{
<f4j2:chart width="320" height="240" data="#{sampleData.getSinus(-4,4)}" label="sin" type="lines" color="yellow" />
}}}

----
=== Dots chart ===

[http://flot4jsf2.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/dots.png]

Code example:
{{{
<f4j2:chart width="320" height="240" data="#{sampleData.data}" label="Random data" type="dots" />
}}}

----
=== Line chart (steps style)===

[http://flot4jsf2.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/stepline.png]

Code example:
{{{
<f4j2:chart width="320" height="240" data="#{sampleData.getX3(-3,3)}" type="lines" steps="true" label="step line" />
}}}

----
=== Line chart (fill style, direct data input)===

[http://flot4jsf2.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/fillline.png]

Code example:
{{{
<f4j2:chart width="320" height="240" data="[[-2,-5],[0,3],[6,-4],[7,5]]" label="data='[[-2,-5],[0,3],[6,-4],[7,5]]'" type="lines" color="green" fill="true" />
}}}

----
=== Line&dots chart===

[http://flot4jsf2.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/dotsline.png]

Code example:
{{{
<f4j2:chart width="320" height="240" data="#{sampleData.getX3(-3,3)}" label="x^3" type="dots, lines" color="blue" />
}}}
